ARGUMENT
k

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | slwispgp.1 | |- S = ( G |`s K ) |
| 2 |  | #P_isslw | |- ( H e. ( P pSyl G ) <-> ( P e. Prime /\ H e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ A. k e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ( ( H C_ k /\ P pGrp ( G |`s k ) ) <-> H = k ) ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_simp3bi | |- ( H e. ( P pSyl G ) -> A. k e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ( ( H C_ k /\ P pGrp ( G |`s k ) ) <-> H = k ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_sseq2 | |- ( k = K -> ( H C_ k <-> H C_ K ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( k = K -> ( G |`s k ) = ( G |`s K ) ) |
| 6 | 5, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( k = K -> ( G |`s k ) = S ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_breq2d | |- ( k = K -> ( P pGrp ( G |`s k ) <-> P pGrp S ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_anbi12d | |- ( k = K -> ( ( H C_ k /\ P pGrp ( G |`s k ) ) <-> ( H C_ K /\ P pGrp S ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqeq2 | |- ( k = K -> ( H = k <-> H = K ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_bibi12d | |- ( k = K -> ( ( ( H C_ k /\ P pGrp ( G |`s k ) ) <-> H = k ) <-> ( ( H C_ K /\ P pGrp S ) <-> H = K ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_rspccva | |- ( ( A. k e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ( ( H C_ k /\ P pGrp ( G |`s k ) ) <-> H = k ) /\ K e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> ( ( H C_ K /\ P pGrp S ) <-> H = K ) ) |
| 12 | 3, 11 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( H e. ( P pSyl G ) /\ K e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> ( ( H C_ K /\ P pGrp S ) <-> H = K ) ) |
